name: fifth
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 5th written as a word: the fifth floor of the buildingthe fifth of Tomorrow is the fifth of September.the fifth My birthday is in January, on the fifth.be/come fifth I was/came fifth in the race.
More examplesFewer examplesBeethoven's fifth symphony has been arranged for the piano.The meeting is on the fifth and we're hoping everyone will attend.You're the fifth person to ask me that question.He was the fifth climber to die on these mountains over the past two days.He lit his fifth cigarette in half an hour.

fifth noun [C]
(part)
B1 one of five equal parts of something: One fifth is the same as 20 percent.

fifth noun [C]
(MUSIC)
music
  specialized the distance between two musical notes that are five notes apart: D is a fifth up from G. He writes lush melodies full of open fifths, augmented fourths, and sevenths.
More examplesFewer examplesHe plays fifths instead of octaves, a practice he inherited from his piano teacher.

(a person or thing) coming immediately after the fourth and before all others: Leo was fifth in the race. [ C ] Tomorrow is the fifth of September.
A fifth is one of five equal parts of something.
